Projects: (1) Research on intelligent processing methods and application of time-varying complex flow field data in biomedical field. Key project of NSFC, 2020-01 - 2023-12. Co-PI (2) Research on the theories and applications of surface smooth cross fields construction with singularity optimization. NSFC project, 2018-01 - 2021-12. PI (3) Research on Key Technologies of Multi-Human Body Modeling Based on Distributed RGB-D Sensor Network in Complex Environment. The key research and development project of Shandong province, 2017.08 â 2019.08. PI (4) Research on theories and applications of high precision constant mean curvature surface modeling. NSFC project, 2016-01 - 2016-12. PI (5) Research of rapid modelling based on 4D medical images. NSFC project, 2013.1 - 2015.12. PI (6) Research on 3D tetrahedral mesh generation of medical image via hybrid optimization, the Scientific Research Foundation for the Excellent Middle-Aged and Youth Scientists of Shandong Province of China, 2013.10 - 2015.10. PI (7) Research on 3D modeling problems of the dynamic digital human heart with high precision, Shandong University Innovation Foundation, 2012.11 - 2014.11. PI (7) 3D locating and visualization systems for low-frequency rotating magnetic therapy equipment, enterprise cooperation projects, 2013.4 - 2014.12. PI 2009 - 2012: (1) The project of WATERMAN, The University of Hong Kong. (2) The project of Remote visualization and system implementation of massive data in large scale dynamic scene, 863 project.
